gem.name: Baby Gem Salad

octopus.description: cannellini bean romesco, citrus gremolata, lemon, extra virgin olive oil

halibut.name: Atlantic Halibut
halibut.description: green asparagus, confit potato, pickled vegetables, wild leek hollandaise

cod.name: Miso Glazed Black Cod
cod.description: roasted cauliflower & sesame emulsion, steamed greens, chili ponzu dressing, shiitake, lotus chips

lobster.name: Lobster Roll
lobster.description: East Coast lobster, dill mayo, toasted milk bun, french fries

pepe.name: Cacio e Pepe
pepe.description: fresh canestri pasta, kampot pepper, pecorino toscano, stracciatella, pickled pine nuts (v)

spagetti.name: Lobster Spagetti
spagetti.description: half butter poached lobster, fresh squid ink pasta, fresh herbs, roasted lobster sauce

banana.name: Banana & Toffee Cream Pie
banana.description: dulce de leche, banana cream, vanilla, white chocolate

chocolate-cake.name: Dark Valrhona Chocolate Cake
chocolate-cake.description: popcorn mousse, candied peanut, white chocolate & sesame ice cream

toffee-pudding.name: Sticky Toffee Pudding
toffee-pudding.description: Bourbon toffee sauce, toasted hazelnuts, brown butter & caramel ice cream

crepe.name: Crepe Suzette for Two
crepe.description: Cointreau flambéed strawberries, balsamic ice cream, fresh cracked black pepper

panna.name: Panna Cotta
panna.description: orange blossom honey panna cotta, blood orange sorbet, honey tuile

amaro.name: Amaro Punch
amaro.description: Doragrosso Amaro, Cherry Hibiscus Syrup, Yuzu Lemon, Soda

cosmo.name: Cosmopolitan
cosmo.description: Smirnoff Vodka, Cointreau, Lime Juice, Cranberry Juice

green.name: Green Fuego
green.description: Sweet Pea Infused Tromba Blanco Tequila, Cointreau, Orgeat, Cucumber Juice, Absinthe, Lime Juice, Grapefruit Bitters, Fire Tincture

long.name: Long Island Iced Tea
long.description: Smirnoff Vodka, Tanqueray Gin, Captain Morgan’s White Rum, Tromba Blanco Tequila, Cointreau, Lemon, Coke

paloma.name: Paloma
paloma.description: Tromba Blanco Tequila, Lime Juice, Grapefruit Juice, Soda

sangria.name: Sangria
sangria.description: Red Wine, Cassis, Chambord, Brandy, Cranberry Juice, Orange Juice, Seasonal Fruit

aviation.name: Aviation
aviation.description: Tanqueray Gin, Luxardo Maraschino, Crème de Violette, Lemon

cave.name: Cave Sping Riesling
cave.description: A fruit driven wine with crunchy apple notes and a fresh, crisp, finish.(Niagara, Canada)

blanc.name: Loveblock Sauvignon Blanc
blanc.description: Rounded with distinctive floral notes. ‘The beautiful butterfly’.(Marlborough, New Zealand)

cloud.name: Cloudsley Cellers Chardonnay
cloud.description: A bright fresh dry fruity wine made from the Narince and Emir grape variety.(Niagara, Canada)

umani.name: Umani Ronchi Vellodoro Pecorino
umani.description: A fresh, crisp fruity wine with a dry medium finish which has a pungent bouquet and everlasting lingering green fruit flavours.(Abruzzo, Italy)

house.name: House White
house.description: Medium bodied, rounded showing aromas of peach and wild flowers on the nose.(California, USA)

villa.name: Villa Marccheesi Pinot Grigio
villa.description: Fresh flavours of white stone fruit, white flowers and a fennel, salty, saline finish.(Friuli, Italie)

beronia.name: Beronia
beronia.description: Open and soft, this elegant fruit focused wine has a rich supple juicy finish.(Rioja, Spain)

rosso.name: Fiora Rosso Domini del Leon
rosso.description: Deep, ripe, and soft red fruits, supported by great depth and structure, as well as a hint of spice.(Veneto, Italy)

sassi.name: Bertinga Sassi Ciusi
sassi.description: Deep, ripe, mellow soft red fruits backed with great depth and structure plus a hint of spice.(Toscanna, Italy)

house.name: House Red
house.description: A well balanced wine showing good acidity on the mouthfeel and full on the palate.(California, USA)

salva.name: Camino Salva
salva.description: A soft, light yet full flavoured Merlot from the Southern slopes of France. (Bordeaux, France)

noir.name: Tawse Pinot Noir
noir.description: Wonderful aromas of wild strawberries and ripe red fruit.(Niagara, Canada)

sandi.name: Villan Sandi Prosecco
sandi.description: Lots of fun fizz, creamy with white stone fruit flavours.(Toscanna, Italy)

rose.name: Lunetta Brut Rose
rose.description: Great fizz. Prosecco in style. A gentle pink in colour with a refreshing soft fruity finish.(Veneto, Italy)

moon.name: Blue Moon
moon.description: Lively citra hop notes of lemon peel & fresh grapefruit zest and pale gold in appearance(ABV:4.3%)

molson.name: Molson Canadian
molson.description: Light and tropical with notes of passionfruit and mango along with just a hint of sherbet on your tongue.(ABV:4.6%))

steam.name: Steamwhistle
steam.description: Light and hoppy, with citrus pith and grapefruit.(ABV:4%))

sol.name: Gispy Hill
sol.description: Zesty pale ale with luscious grapefruits orange and aromatic pine aromas.(ABV:4.7%))

peroni.name: Peroni
peroni.description: Finished with a refreshingly light citrus peel and bittersweet flavour.(ABV:5.1%)

sapporo.name: Easy Livin'
sapporo.description: Incredibly soft and delicate with intense tropical fruit hop aromatics and saturation.(ABV:5%)

blood.name: Blood Brothers Blood Light
blood.description: A tropical taste and a perfectly smooth finish.(ABV:4.1%)

sour.name: Goodlot Fruition Sour
sour.description: Soft and sessionable but packed with tropical flavours and a light piney finish.(ABV:3.1%)

amber.name: Henderson's Amber Ale
amber.description: Black coffee and dark chocolate notes. It’s just as refreshing as our classic lagers yet rich, sweet, bold and more-ish(ABV:4.7%)

wilda.name: Wilda Seltzer Seasonal
wilda.description: Bursting with flavours of Mango and Passionfruit.(ABV:4.2%)
